author: mwomack
msg: Moved getLoggerRepository to base Action class so it can be used by all subclasses.  Centralizes logic for locating the LoggerRepository being acted upon.

author: mwomack
msg: Removed use of deprecated activateOptions in favor of new method activate.

author: carnold
msg: Excluding new SMTPAppenderTest to allow Gump to run again

author: psmith
msg: * Modifications to the Chainsaw build process to ensure the Webstart & non-webstart bundles are built correctly.
* Tweaked chainsaw.bat to include the correct jars (now that there's more of them)
* updated the Webstart JNLP template file to reflect the required jars
* Update the Version and release notes
